name: 52-Week High Momentum
description: Buy stocks showing strong 12-month momentum (proxy for near 52-week high), exit when momentum turns negative
rationale: Academic research by George & Hwang (2004) shows stocks near 52-week highs yield 0.65%/month - nearly double other momentum strategies. Edge exists due to anchoring bias: traders underreact when stocks approach highs. Using ROC(252) as proxy for 12-month momentum to identify stocks with strong year-long performance.
